title: BRIEF-Europejski Fundusz Energii signs deal with L
text:
BRIEF-Europejski Fundusz Energii signs deal with L&P Sept 2 
Sept 2 Europejski Fundusz Energii SA : 
* Said on Tuesday it started business activity of delivering solar panels, photovoltaic and hot-cold, air-water pumps installations 
* Said signed deal with L&P, based in Bydgoszcz, Poland, to deliver solar panels and hot-cold, air-water pumps installations
